Miuniku

Minuiku is the brainchild of sisters Tina and Nikita from Mumbai. They are recipients of the special Jury prize LVMH for young fashiohn Designers 2014. They call the brand Miuniku because that was the nickname their parants gave them. Not in a long time have I seen a collection that hit me like a tsunami. Their vivid use of colors and refined aesthetics makes it hard not to fall in love with their vision for the brand.

Miuniku

Minuiku is the brainchild of sisters Tina and Nikita from Mumbai. They are recipients of the special Jury prize LVMH for young fashiohn Designers 2014. They call the brand Miuniku because that was the nickname their parants gave them. Not in a long time have I seen a collection that hit me like a tsunami. Their vivid use of colors and refined aesthetics makes it hard not to fall in love with their vision for the brand.
